news_header: Shoppers are warned about online scams related to luxury advent calendars as Black Friday approaches.
news_text: As luxury advent calendars gain popularity, shoppers are cautioned to be vigilant against online scams. The consumer group Which? has highlighted fraudulent offers that seem too good to be true, especially ahead of Black Friday sales. Retailers like Space NK have reported fake advertisements on social media, promoting their sold-out £250 advent calendar for only £28.99. Experts advise consumers to verify website URLs and be skeptical of unusually low prices, as scammers are likely to exploit the holiday shopping season.
